abstract.text: Creates a send message intent object with the specified content and recipients.

when the user sends a message directly in your app. When the user initiates sending a message from outside your app, such as asking Siri or tapping a contact in the Share Sheet, the system creates the intent and provides it to your intent handler.

abstract.text: Empower people to customize interactions for your app on their device.
An interaction between the user and your app involving an intent object.
Information about a person participating in a SiriKit interaction.
A file to include in a message.
A request to send a message to the designated recipients.
Creates a send message intent object with the specified content and recipients.
A custom phrase to be resolved by an Intents extension.
A static, plain-text Unicode string object which you use when you need reference semantics or other Foundation-specific behavior.
A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
